00241        // det = signed determinant of Jacobian Matrix at a Vertex
00242        // delta = scaling parameter
00243      static inline double vertex_barrier_function(double det, double delta) 
00244             { return 0.5*(det+sqrt(det*det+4*delta*delta)); }
